sentences.sContent: You need to prioritize your tasks.
sentences.sCn: 你需要按照轻重缓急安排自己的工作。

remMethod.val: 来自priority(n. 优先事项； 优先， 重点)

words.tran: 优先；优先权；[数] 优先次序；优先考虑的事

trans.tranCn: 划分优先顺序； 优先处理
trans.tranOther: to put several things, problems etc in order of importance, so that you can deal with the most important ones first
